title: All Pinterest Wants for Christmas Is Users
sub_head: Pinterest bulls hoping users will come home to the platform for the holidays may be disappointed
body:
Pinterest is trading today at roughly the same price at which it ended the third quarter of last year, when new users were flooding onto the platform. The problem is, lately, those users are leaving.
With Pinterestâ€™s stock now down nearly 58% from the highs it hit in February, the bull case has been the belief that user attrition ended in the third quarter, with upside ahead for new initiatives in commerce. Fresh data show that may be a dream deferred.
